dcterms:description: The BraTs 2016 dataset includes high-quality multi-modal MRI scans from 274 patients, featuring T1, T1-weighted post-contrast, T2, and FLAIR sequences, used for brain tumor segmentation.
dcterms:title: BraTs 2016

dcterms:description: The BraTs 2017 dataset includes high-quality multi-modal MRI scans from 285 patients, featuring T1, T1-weighted post-contrast, T2, and FLAIR sequences, used for brain tumor segmentation.
dcterms:title: BraTs 2017

dcterms:description: The Combined BraTs dataset merges the BraTs 2016 and 2017 datasets to improve sample diversity for brain tumor segmentation tasks.
dcterms:title: Combined BraTs

dcterms:description: The AbdomenCT-1K dataset includes over a thousand abdominal CT scans from various vendors and phases, used to assess the generalizability of medical image segmentation approaches.
dcterms:title: AbdomenCT-1K
